account_id.description: The unique identifier for the Facebook ad account.

account_status.description: The status of the Facebook ad account.

age.description: Age associated with the ad account.

amount_spent.description: Total amount spent on ads by the ad account.

balance.description: Current balance of the ad account.

business.description: Represents information about the business associated with the ad account.

id.description: The unique identifier for the associated business.

business_country_code.description: Country code associated with the business.

business_street2.description: Additional street information of the business.

business_zip.description: ZIP code associated with the business.

can_create_brand_lift_study.description: Flag indicating if the ad account can create brand lift studies.

capabilities.description: Specifies the capabilities of the ad account.

items.description: List of capabilities associated with the ad account.

created_time.description: Date and time when the ad account was created.

currency.description: Currency used by the ad account.

disable_reason.description: Reason for disabling the ad account.

end_advertiser.description: The end advertiser associated with the ad account.

extended_credit_invoice_group.description: Contains details about the extended credit invoice group linked to the ad account.

id.description: Unique identifier for the extended credit invoice group.

auto_enroll.description: Flag indicating if auto-enroll is enabled.

email.description: Email address associated with the extended credit invoice group.

emails.description: Emails associated with the extended credit invoice group.

items.description: List of email addresses associated with the extended credit invoice group.

name.description: Name of the extended credit invoice group.

failed_delivery_checks.description: List of failed delivery checks performed for the ad account.

summary.description: Summary of the failed delivery check.

description.description: Description of the failed delivery check.

check_name.description: Name of the failed delivery check.

fb_entity.description: Facebook entity associated with the ad account.

funding_source.description: Source of funding for the ad account.

funding_source_details.description: Provides information about the funding source linked to the ad account.

display_string.description: Display string for the funding source details.

id.description: Unique identifier for the funding source.

has_migrated_permissions.description: Flag indicating if permissions have been migrated.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ad account.

io_number.description: IO number associated with the ad account.

is_attribution_spec_system_default.description: Flag indicating if attribution specification is system default.

is_direct_deals_enabled.description: Flag indicating if direct deals are enabled.

is_in_3ds_authorization_enabled_market.description: Flag indicating if the ad account is in a 3DS authorization enabled market.

is_notifications_enabled.description: Flag indicating if notifications are enabled for the ad account.

is_personal.description: Flag indicating if the ad account is personal.

is_prepay_account.description: Flag indicating if the ad account is a prepay account.

is_tax_id_required.description: Flag indicating if a tax ID is required for the ad account.

line_numbers.description: Line numbers associated with the ad account.

media_agency.description: Media agency associated with the ad account.

min_campaign_group_spend_cap.description: Minimum campaign group spend cap for the ad account.

min_daily_budget.description: Minimum daily budget for the ad account.

offsite_pixels_tos_accepted.description: Flag indicating if offsite pixels terms of service are accepted.

partner.description: Partner associated with the ad account.

rf_spec.description: Specifications related to reach and frequency for the ad account.

countries.description: List of countries targeted by the ad account for reach and frequency campaigns.

items.description: List of countries specified in the RF spec.

global_io_max_campaign_duration.description: Global max duration of the IO campaign.

max_days_to_finish.description: Max days to finish the campaign.

min_reach_limits.description: Min reach limits specified in the RF spec.

spend_cap.description: Spend cap for the ad account.

tax_id.description: Tax ID associated with the ad account.

tax_id_status.description: Status of the tax ID associated with the ad account.

tax_id_type.description: Type of tax ID associated with the ad account.

timezone_id.description: Timezone ID associated with the ad account.

timezone_name.description: Name of the timezone associated with the ad account.

timezone_offset_hours_utc.description: Timezone offset hours in UTC for the ad account.

tos_accepted.description: Indicates whether the terms of service have been accepted for the ad account.

web_custom_audience_tos.description: TOS accepted for web custom audience.

user_tasks.description: Tasks assigned to users associated with the ad account.

items.description: List of user tasks associated with the ad account.

user_tos_accepted.description: Records the acceptance of terms of service by users of the ad account.

web_custom_audience_tos.description: TOS accepted for web custom audience by the user.

name.description: The name of the ad set.

end_time.description: The date and time when the ad set will end.

promoted_object.description: Information about the object being promoted in the ad set.

custom_event_type.description: The custom event type used for tracking purposes.

pixel_id.description: The Pixel ID associated with the ad set.

pixel_rule.description: The rule set for the Pixel.

page_id.description: The ID of the promoted Facebook page.

object_store_url.description: The URL of the promoted object in the store.

application_id.description: The ID of the promoted application.

product_set_id.description: The ID of the product set being promoted.

offer_id.description: The ID of the promoted offer.

id.description: The unique ID of the ad set.

account_id.description: The ID of the Facebook ad account to which the ad set belongs.

updated_time.description: The date and time when the ad set was last updated.

daily_budget.description: The daily budget set for the ad set.

budget_remaining.description: The remaining budget in the ad set.

effective_status.description: The effective status of the ad set (e.g., active, paused).

campaign_id.description: The ID of the campaign associated with the ad set.

created_time.description: The date and time when the ad set was created.

start_time.description: The date and time when the ad set will start.

lifetime_budget.description: The lifetime budget set for the ad set.

bid_info.description: Information about bidding in the ad set.

CLICKS.description: Number of clicks on the ad set.

ACTIONS.description: Number of actions taken as a result of the ad set.

IMPRESSIONS.description: Number of times the ad set was displayed.

REACH.description: Number of unique users who saw the ad set.

bid_strategy.description: The bidding strategy used in the ad set.

bid_amount.description: The amount set for bidding in the ad set.

bid_constraints.description: Bid constraints for the ad set.

roas_average_floor.description: The minimum return on ad spend (ROAS) required for the ad set.

adlabels.description: Labels associated with the ad set.

created_time.description: The date and time when the label was created.

updated_time.description: The date and time when the label was last updated.

bid_type.description: The type of bid strategy used for the ad.

account_id.description: The unique identifier for the Facebook ad account.

campaign_id.description: The unique identifier for the campaign associated with the ad.

adset_id.description: The unique identifier for the ad set associated with the ad.

adlabels.description: Ad labels associated with the ad

id.description: The unique identifier for the ad label.

created_time.description: The date and time when the ad label was created.

name.description: The name of the ad label.

updated_time.description: The date and time when the ad label was last updated.

bid_amount.description: The bid amount set for the ad.

CLICKS.description: The bid amount set for clicks.

ACTIONS.description: The bid amount set for actions.

REACH.description: The bid amount set for reach.

IMPRESSIONS.description: The bid amount set for impressions.

SOCIAL.description: The bid amount set for social interactions.

status.description: The current status of the ad.

creative.description: Details of the creative used in the ad

creative_id.description: The unique identifier for the creative used in the ad.

id.description: The unique identifier for the creative.
The unique identifier for the ad.

updated_time.description: The date and time when the ad was last updated.

created_time.description: The date and time when the ad was created.

effective_status.description: The current effectiveness status of the ad.

last_updated_by_app_id.description: The unique identifier for the last app that updated the ad.

recommendations.description: Recommended actions or strategies for the ad

blame_field.description: The field responsible for the recommendation.

code.description: The code associated with the recommendation.

confidence.description: The confidence level of the recommendation.

importance.description: The importance level of the recommendation.

source_ad_id.description: The source ad identifier, if the ad was copied from another ad.

action.type.description: The type of action for tracking.

post.wall.description: The wall post details for tracking.

page.description: The Facebook page associated with tracking.

event_type.description: The type of event for tracking.

fb_pixel.description: The Facebook pixel information for tracking.

fb_pixel_event.description: The Facebook pixel event for tracking.

leadgen.description: The lead generation details for tracking.

object.domain.description: The domain of the object for tracking.

offer.creator.description: The creator of the offer for tracking.

offsite_pixel.description: The offsite pixel information for tracking.

page.parent.description: The parent page of the Facebook page for tracking.

post.object.description: The object of the post for tracking.

post.object.wall.description: The wall object of the post for tracking.

question.creator.description: The creator of the question for tracking.

subtype.description: The subtype of the tracking action.

action.type.description: The type of action for conversions.

post.wall.description: The wall post details for conversions.

page.description: The Facebook page associated with conversions.

event_type.description: The type of event for conversions.

fb_pixel.description: The Facebook pixel information for conversions.

fb_pixel_event.description: The Facebook pixel event for conversions.

leadgen.description: The lead generation details for conversions.

object.domain.description: The domain of the object for conversions.

offer.creator.description: The creator of the offer for conversions.

offsite_pixel.description: The offsite pixel information for conversions.

page.parent.description: The parent page of the Facebook page for conversions.

post.object.description: The object of the post for conversions.

post.object.wall.description: The wall object of the post for conversions.

question.creator.description: The creator of the question for conversions.

body.description: The body text of the ad creative.

object_story_id.description: Story ID associated with the object.

image_url.description: URL of the main image used in the ad creative.

id.description: The unique identifier of the ad creative.

account_id.description: The unique identifier of the Facebook ad account associated with the ad creative.

actor_id.description: The unique identifier of the actor associated with the ad creative.

adlabels.description: A collection of ad labels associated with the ad creative.

id.description: The unique identifier of the ad label.

created_time.description: The timestamp when the ad label was created.

name.description: The name of the ad label.

updated_time.description: The timestamp when the ad label was last updated.

applink_treatment.description: Specifies how the app link is treated.

asset_feed_spec.description: Specifies the asset customization rules, call to actions, and groups for the ad creative.

additional_data.description: Additional data related to the asset feed.

brand_page_id.description: The unique identifier of the brand's Facebook page.

multi_share_end_card.description: Specifies if there is a multi-share end card.

is_click_to_message.description: Indicates whether the ad is a click-to-message ad.

asset_customization_rules.description: Customization rules for assets within the ad creative.

items.description: Rules for customizing the ad asset.

bodies.description: A collection of various bodies for the ad creative.

call_to_actions.description: Actions prompting the audience to take in response to the ad.

captions.description: A collection of captions for the ad creative.

descriptions.description: A collection of descriptions for the ad creative.

groups.description: Group information related to the asset feed.

items.description: Groups information associated with the ad creative.

images.description: A collection of images for the ad creative.

link_urls.description: A collection of link URLs for the ad creative.

optimization_type.description: The optimization type for the ad creative.

reasons_to_shop.description: Reasons to shop specified for the ad creative.

shops_bundle.description: Indicates if the ad creative is part of a shops bundle.

titles.description: A collection of titles for the ad creative.

videos.description: A collection of videos for the ad creative.

call_to_action_type.description: The type of call-to-action for the ad creative.

effective_instagram_story_id.description: The effective Instagram story ID associated with the ad creative.

effective_object_story_id.description: The effective object story ID for the ad creative.

name.description: Name or title of the ad creative.

instagram_actor_id.description: Instagram actor ID associated with the ad creative.

instagram_permalink_url.description: Permalink URL of the ad creative on Instagram.

instagram_story_id.description: ID of the story on Instagram.

link_og_id.description: Open Graph ID related to the link.

object_story_spec.description: Specification for the object story associated with the ad creative.

object_type.description: Type of object associated with the ad creative.

product_set_id.description: ID of the product set linked to the ad creative.

template_url.description: URL of the template used in the ad creative.

image_hash.description: Hash value representing the image used in the ad creative.

url_tags.description: Tags added to the URL of the ad creative.

video_id.description: ID of the video used in the ad creative.

link_url.description: URL associated with the ad creative.

wish_bid.description: Bid based on the wish to achieve certain results

gender.description: The gender targeted by the ad campaign.

account_id.description: The ID of the Facebook Ads account associated with the campaign.

adlabels.description: Labels associated with the ad campaigns.

id.description: The ID of the ad label.

name.description: The name of the ad label.

created_time.description: The date and time when the ad label was created.

updated_time.description: The date and time when the ad label was last updated.

bid_strategy.description: The bid strategy used for the campaign.

boosted_object_id.description: The ID of the boosted object associated with the campaign.

budget_rebalance_flag.description: A flag indicating whether the budget is set to rebalance.

budget_remaining.description: The remaining budget for the campaign.

buying_type.description: The type of buying for the campaign.

daily_budget.description: The daily budget set for the campaign.

created_time.description: The date and time when the campaign was created.

configured_status.description: The configured status of the campaign.

effective_status.description: The effective status of the campaign.

issues_info.description: Information on any issues related to the campaigns.

error_code.description: The error code associated with the issue.

error_message.description: The error message describing the issue.

error_summary.description: A summary of the error associated with the issue.

level.description: The severity level of the issue.

lifetime_budget.description: The lifetime budget set for the campaign.

smart_promotion_type.description: The type of smart promotion used for the campaign.

source_campaign_id.description: The ID of the source campaign, if any.

special_ad_category.description: The special ad category associated with the campaign.

special_ad_category_country.description: The country associated with the special ad category.

spend_cap.description: The spend cap set for the campaign.

start_time.description: The start date and time of the campaign.

stop_time.description: The end date and time of the campaign.

updated_time.description: The date and time when the campaign was last updated.

id.description: Unique identifier for the custom conversion.

account_id.description: Unique identifier for the Facebook ad account.

business.description: Information about the business associated with the custom conversion.

creation_time.description: Date and time when the custom conversion was created.

custom_event_type.description: Type of custom event triggering the conversion.

data_sources.description: Data sources related to the custom conversion.

default_conversion_value.description: Default value assigned to the conversion event if no specific value is provided.

description.description: Brief description of the custom conversion.

event_source_type.description: Type of event source triggering the custom conversion.

first_fired_time.description: Date and time when the custom conversion was first triggered.

is_archived.description: Flag indicating if the custom conversion is archived.

is_unavailable.description: Flag indicating if the custom conversion is unavailable.

last_fired_time.description: Date and time when the custom conversion was last triggered.

offline_conversion_data_set.description: If applicable, the data set for offline conversions.

retention_days.description: Number of days for which the conversion data is retained.

rule.description: Rules or conditions triggering the custom conversion.

id.description: The unique identifier for the custom audience.

account_id.description: The ID of the Facebook account associated with the custom audience.

approximate_count_lower_bound.description: An estimated lower bound count of the size of the custom audience.

approximate_count_upper_bound.description: An estimated upper bound count of the size of the custom audience.

customer_file_source.description: The source of the customer file used to create the custom audience.

data_source.description: Information about the source of the custom audience.

type.description: The type of data source used.

sub_type.description: The sub-type of the data source.

creation_params.description: Parameters used for creating the data source.

delivery_status.description: Status of the delivery related to the custom audience.

code.description: The code representing the delivery status of the custom audience.

description.description: Description of the delivery status of the custom audience.
Description or any additional information related to the custom audience.

is_value_based.description: Indicates if the custom audience is value-based or not.

lookalike_audience_ids.description: IDs of lookalike audiences based on this custom audience.

items.description: List of IDs of lookalike audiences based on this custom audience.

country.description: The country used as a basis for creating the lookalike audience.

ratio.description: The ratio of the lookalike audience.

type.description: The type of lookalike audience being created.

origin.description: Details about the original custom audience for lookalike creation.

id.description: The ID of the origin for the lookalike audience.

name.description: The name of the origin for the lookalike audience.

type.description: The type of the origin used for the lookalike audience.

name.description: The name given to the custom audience.

operation_status.description: Status of ongoing operations related to the custom audience.

code.description: The code representing the operation status of the custom audience.

description.description: Description of the operation status of the custom audience.

opt_out_link.description: The link for opting out of the custom audience.

page_deletion_marked_delete_time.description: The time when the page deletion was marked for deletion.

permission_for_actions.description: Permissions granted for actions associated with the custom audience.

can_edit.description: Indicates if the user can edit the custom audience.

can_see_insight.description: Indicates if the user can see insights for the custom audience.

can_share.description: Indicates if the user can share the custom audience.

subtype_supports_lookalike.description: Indicates if the subtype supports lookalike audiences.

supports_recipient_lookalike.description: Indicates if recipient lookalike audiences are supported.

pixel_id.description: The ID of the pixel associated with the custom audience.

retention_days.description: The number of days data for the custom audience will be retained.

rule.description: The rule or condition used to define the custom audience.

rule_aggregation.description: The aggregation method used for rules in the custom audience.

sharing_status.description: Status of sharing permissions for the custom audience.

code.description: The code representing the sharing status of the custom audience.

description.description: Description of the sharing status of the custom audience.

subtype.description: The subtype of the custom audience.

time_content_updated.description: The time when the content of the custom audience was last updated.

time_created.description: The time when the custom audience was created.

time_updated.description: The time when the custom audience was last updated.

account_id.description: The unique identifier of the Facebook advertising account associated with the image data.

id.description: The unique identifier of the image data.

name.description: The name or label assigned to the image.

creatives.description: Additional information or metadata related to the image.

original_height.description: The original height dimension of the image in pixels.

original_width.description: The original width dimension of the image in pixels.

permalink_url.description: The permanent URL where the image can be accessed or viewed.

status.description: The current status or state of the image data.

url.description: The URL pointing to the image file.

created_time.description: The date and time when the image was initially created.

hash.description: A unique hash value generated for the image.

url_128.description: The URL pointing to a lower resolution (128px) version of the image file.

is_associated_creatives_in_adgroups.description: Indicates if the image is associated with creatives in ad groups.

filename.description: The name of the file containing the image data.

updated_time.description: The date and time when the image data was last updated.

height.description: The height dimension of the image in pixels.

width.description: The width dimension of the image in pixels.

account_id.description: The ID of the Facebook account associated with the video.

ad_breaks.description: Information about ad breaks within the video.

backdated_time.description: The time when the video was backdated.

content_category.description: The category of the video content.

content_tags.description: Tags associated with the video content.

created_time.description: The time when the video was created.

custom_labels.description: Custom labels assigned to the video.

description.description: Description or caption of the video.

embed_html.description: HTML code for embedding the video.

embeddable.description: Flag indicating if the video is embeddable.

format.description: Specifies the format of the video data being fetched.

items.description: Different formats available for the video.

filter.description: Filter applied to the video format.

embed_html.description: HTML code for embedding the video in a specific format.

picture.description: URL of the thumbnail picture for the video format.

is_crosspost_video.description: Flag indicating if the video is a crosspost.

is_crossposting_eligible.description: Flag indicating if the video is eligible for crossposting.

is_episode.description: Flag indicating if the video is an episode of a series.

is_instagram_eligible.description: Flag indicating if the video is eligible for posting on Instagram.

permalink_url.description: URL for accessing the video directly.

post_views.description: Number of views on the video post.

premiere_living_room_status.description: Status of the video premiere in living rooms.

published.description: Flag indicating if the video is published.

scheduled_publish_time.description: Scheduled time for publishing the video.

title.description: Title or name of the video.

universal_video_id.description: Universal unique ID for the video.

updated_time.description: The time when the video was last updated.

views.description: Number of views on the video.

account_id.description: The unique identifier for the account associated with the activity.

actor_id.description: The unique identifier for the actor (user/page) who performed the activity.

actor_name.description: The name of the actor (user/page) who performed the activity.

application_id.description: The unique identifier for the application involved in the activity.

application_name.description: The name of the application involved in the activity.

date_time_in_timezone.description: The date and time of the activity adjusted to the timezone.

event_time.description: The exact date and time when the activity occurred.

event_type.description: The type of event/action performed in the activity.

extra_data.description: Additional data associated with the activity.

object_id.description: The unique identifier for the object (post/ad/etc.) related to the activity.

object_name.description: The name/label of the object related to the activity.

object_type.description: The type/category of the object related to the activity.

translated_event_type.description: The translated or localized version of the event type.

gender.description: The gender targeted by the ad campaign.
